creditline: Gift of Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: one of pair, painted glass table screens in carved teakwood frames; vertical mirror-back glass painted in various colors with scenes depicting mountains, wooded landscapes with three sages standing in the foreground, two riding horseback and two talking together; teakwood frames have narrow painted glass borders and carved ivory corner ornaments.
object_name: Painted Glass Table Screen in Teakwood Frame, one of a pair
title: Painted Glass Table Screen in Teakwood Frame, one of a pair
